summary: HeroSection.tsx was updated to reference the new background image path and retain cover/no-repeat styling, satisfying REQ-11. However, the required new image asset file was not added under frontend/public/assets/generated, so REQ-10 is not met. Two additional project metadata files were modified without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate a new hero background image depicting a moon scene with a waterfall on one side and a volcano with the sun on the other side, and add it as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename anime-hero-bg-moon-waterfall-volcano-sun.dim_1920x1080.png.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, and there is no evidence of a new image file being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.
evidence: File diff summary: "Added: 0" and "ADDED FILES: - none"

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/maintained generated documentation/metadata files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to add a static image asset and update HeroSection.tsx; it does not request changes to summary/metadata files.
